did.unittitle: Maresi Company Confectioners and Caterers invoice
did.abstract: The collection contains one invoice from 1903 for catering an event at the Flushing Institute in Flushing, Long Island. The invoice includes a list of menu items served at the event. The Maresi Company Confectioners and Caterers had locations in Brooklyn (30 Clinton Street; 76 Seventh Avenue) and Manhattan (719 Sixth Avenue; 589 Madison Avenue; 320 Columbus Avenue).
